segment.source: Understanding the file hash rule condition in AppLocker (Windows 10)
segment.target: Understanding the file hash rule condition in AppLocker (Windows 10)

segment.source: This topic explains the AppLocker file hash rule condition, the advantages and disadvantages, and how it is applied.
segment.target: This topic explains the AppLocker file hash rule condition, the advantages and disadvantages, and how it is applied.

segment.source: Understanding the file hash rule condition in AppLocker
segment.target: Understanding the file hash rule condition in AppLocker

segment.source: This topic explains the AppLocker file hash rule condition, the advantages and disadvantages, and how it is applied.
segment.target: This topic explains the AppLocker file hash rule condition, the advantages and disadvantages, and how it is applied.

segment.source: File hash rules use a system-computed cryptographic hash of the identified file.
segment.target: File hash rules use a system-computed cryptographic hash of the identified file.

segment.source: For files that are not digitally signed, file hash rules are more secure than path rules.
segment.target: For files that are not digitally signed, file hash rules are more secure than path rules.

segment.source: The following table describes the advantages and disadvantages of the file hash condition.
segment.target: The following table describes the advantages and disadvantages of the file hash condition.

segment.source: Because each file has a unique hash, a file hash condition applies to only one file.
segment.target: Because each file has a unique hash, a file hash condition applies to only one file.

segment.source: Each time that the file is updated (such as a security update or upgrade), the file's hash will change.
segment.target: Each time that the file is updated (such as a security update or upgrade), the file's hash will change.

segment.source: As a result, you must manually update file hash rules.
segment.target: As a result, you must manually update file hash rules.

segment.source: For an overview of the three types of AppLocker rule conditions and explanations of the advantages and disadvantages of each, see Understanding AppLocker rule condition types.
segment.target: For an overview of the three types of AppLocker rule conditions and explanations of the advantages and disadvantages of each, see Understanding AppLocker rule condition types.
